column3: John Ronald Reuel Tolkien]] is born to [[Arthur Tolkien
column5: Mabel Tolkien]] at Bank House, Maitland Street, in [[Bloemfontein]], South Africa.

column2: 4]]''' - [[Arthur Tolkien]] sends a letter to his mother about his new son.
31]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is christened in the Anglican Cathedral in Bloemfontein.

15]]''' - Arthur, Mabel, two household servants, and the nurse holding Ronald pose for a picture in the garden at Bank House. The photograph is used in Tolkien Christmas cards sent to family and friends. The image is reproduced in [[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]] and [[The Tolkien Family Album]].
